name: Road Rebel: with music by Rob Zombie, Mot\u00f6rhead, Pussy Riot
blurb: Join the Road Rebel Revolution! Drive heavy metal, armed combat cars --  and harness our code, art, and tools to build your own game.

rewards.reward: JUMPSTART: You rock! You dropped in some quarters -- and helped spread the word by posting on Facebook and Twitter. You are helping us take Road Rebel to the next level and we really appreciate it! You'll get all our updates on the fantastic progress we make. Thank you!
FIRST! Because you are first, you can get in on the Shadetree Mechanic level for only $15 instead of $20!

SHADETREE MECHANIC: You will be among the first to receive Road Rebel on PC via digital download, you'll be listed as a patron on the Road Rebel website, and you'll get cool Road Rebel wall paper to stoke your inner fire and keep you warm on those cold, post-apocalyptic nights.
REPO MAN: Get the ROCK AND ROLL HELLION level of rewards for only $35 instead of $45. Sweet!

ROCK AND ROLL HELLION: This level includes all the SHADETREE MECHANIC rewards, plus early access to the Beta release and private forums for you to get involved with the game. You will get to see how Road Rebel evolves and help us tune the game for release. You'll also be able to reserve your player name and get a special badge in your profile showing that you supported the Kickstarter!
CARJACK: For signing up early, we will give you the MUSCLE CAR level for $15 off! Help us by spreading the word!

MUSCLE CAR: Pop the hood with in-game Mod Tools and game creation tutorials. Make Road Rebel your own! You'll get: updates, download of the game, your name on our website, wallpaper, and beta access. You'll also get exclusive access to our Mod Forums, the Road Rebel Production Artbook PDF, and a Kickstarter-exclusive car available only to our backers.

VEHICULAR COMBAT: Here you get the collectors edition premium boxed set, a special edition t-shirt, special access to the Alpha (way before anyone else), and your name in lights in the credits. And we'll throw in a digital copy of the game in case you want to keep your boxed set boxed. This includes all rewards from the Shadetree Mechanic, the Rock and Roll Hellion, and Muscle Car levels.

SAILOR JERRY: Do you see things in triangles? So does our art team, and you can get involved with them here. We will load you up with everything from Vehicular Combat, then we will throw in access to our art content. You will be able to download the editable 3D files, tutorials, textures, sounds, and other art assets we make for the game! You can jump into the Art Dev Forums and learn how to make games look and feel the way you envision.  And that boxed set you get - it will be signed. Yep, signed.

AFTERMARKET: If coding is your game, then this is where you want to be. You'll get access to game SDK's, tool code, and continuous access to the Road Rebel source control server. You will get access to the development forums and tutorials where our team and community will help you learn how to bend the engine to your will. World domination is within your grasp.

GET BOMBED: Here we will bomb your tag on the streets of Road Rebel. Our artists will work with you to create a custom Graffiti Tag that we will place all over the game. This level includes a custom created in-game graffiti tag, an extra game download (so you can use your little brother for target practice and keep score), and everything in the Aftermarket level. Woot!

IRONMONGER: Here you can enjoy a virtual career as a high tech manufacturer of Road Rebel technology! You and our design team will create and name a virtual equipment manufacturer and an in-game item that players will get to use. Has our R&D department successfully created the first beercan chaingun (called the Spud-in-ator)? Your imagination is the limit! This includes everything in AFTERMARKET as well.

THE DRAG: Ever wanted to own a bar, night club, or even a meat packing plant? Well here is your chance to grab some virtual real estate and set up shop. We will help you design the look and feel of your establishment and put it in some prime Road Rebel neighborhood. In addition to your place in the game, you will get everything in the AFTERMARKET level.

CHOP SHOP: Roll your mom's old station wagon into the shop and our team will treat it right! We will throw it away and design something totally cool to put into Road Rebel. You will tell us what kind of hotrod gets your motor running and we will build it into the game for you. Put in anything from hydraulics for your low-rider to 2" of plate armor for your truck \u2014 or a waterbed in the back of your van. You decide! Also get everything in the AFTERMARKET level to boot.

ON A ROLL: Hang on to your Quads, you're now an honorary member of the Texas Roller Derby. You will get season tickets to all the Derby events and VIP passes for you and your guest to the Annual Championship match and an invitation to paint Austin red with the TXRD and Monstrous Team. We will immortalize you in the game by basing an NPC character on you, or a character you design. You will also get everything in the AFTERMARKET section!

VEGAS SHOOT OUT: Meet with the Monstrous team in Vegas for a day of insane fun (details to be revealed!). Talk code, art, design, or whatever with the crew. This includes your choice of either the CHOP SHOP level -or- the IRONMONGER level plus THE DRAG level.

DRIVE AND DESTROY: Ever drive a tank? Wanna? Back at this level and that's exactly what you will get to do! Meet the Monstrous team and spend the afternoon cruising around in a real tank and running over cars. Then make your way to Vegas for a day of insane fun. (details to be revealed!) Then head to Austin to party with the Rollerderby crew. By the time you are done with this level, you'll have the real world experience that your player in the game needs to survive.  This includes it all!
